column1: Specifications: "Next-gen indoor/outdoor 4K PoE camera with exceptional image performance
Record audio with an integrated microphone
Optional Enhancer for integrated floodlight and extended IR*
*Enhancer compatible with G5 Pro cameras purchased after June 13
"Night mode": "Built-in IR LED illumination and IR cut filter"
"Ambient operating temperature": "-20 to 50º C (-4 to 122º F)"
